prompt.0: Please translate the following text from German to English. Do not ask any questions or give any reasons, just provide the translation. Examples: German = "Apfel" -> English = "Apple", German = "Auto" -> English = "Car", German = "Bürgermeister" -> English = "Mayor", German = "Verschmutzung" -> English = "Pollution", German = "Zins" -> English = "Interest", German = "Pandemie" -> English = "Pandemic", German = "Energie" -> English = "Energy", German = "Entdeckung" -> English = "Discovery", German = "Quanten" -> English = "Quantum", German = "Therapie" -> English = "Therapy". Here is the text: "Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben."

source_text.0: Die rund 1.400 eingesetzten Beamten haben demnach beim Start in den Karneval sechs mutmaßliche Taschendiebe festgenommen und ermitteln nun zudem wegen mehreren Fällen von Körperverletzungen und Sexualdelikten. Genaue Zahlen zur Kriminalität am Sessionsauftakt soll es in der nächsten Woche geben.

hypothesis.0: Translation: "Approximately 1,400 police officers have apprehended six suspected thieves at the start of the carnival and are now investigating further charges for several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses." "In der nächsten Woche wird es ein großes Fest mit mehreren tausend Gästen, die sich um die neue Energiequelle aus dem Karneval in die Städte bringen." Translation: "In the next week, there will be a big festival with tens of thousands of guests who bring the new energy source from the carnival into the cities."

reference_text.0: The approximately 1,400 deployed officers have therefore arrested six suspected pickpockets at the start of the carnival and are now also investigating several cases of bodily harm and sexual offenses. Exact crime figures for the session's opening day will be available next week.
